Monsters.desc:
Wild Rat
'A rat that has become fierce while scurrying in the wild.'
Difficulty: Beginner

Wild Dog
'A wild dog affected by a madening disease.'
Difficulty: Beginner

Bear
'Just a wild bear.'
Difficulty: Novice

Deprived Peasant
'A deprived peasant who robs, steals, and hurts for living.'
Difficulty: Novice

Adventurer
'An adventurer who seeks challenges and is not afraid of a fight or two. A worthy opponent.'
Difficulty: Novice

Lone Bandit
'A bandit who has left his band and now attacks lone passersby.'
Difficulty: Amateur

Tribal Hunter
'A hunter from the tribe of Hakagnki. A hunter with tribal instincts.'
Difficulty: Amateur.

Grizzly Bear
'A wild Grizzly Bear.'
Difficulty: Adept

Savage Wolf
'A ferocious, hungry beast.'
Difficulty: Adept

Dwarf
'A paranoid dwarf who thinks everyone is out to steal his money. He must have a lot of gold but it's better to stay away.
Difficulty: Intermediate

Bandit Leader
'A bandit leader in hunt for the Lone Bandit. He kills everyone who comes in his path.'
Difficulty: Adept

Treant
'A monsterous tree that has been disturbed from its slumber.'
Difficulty: Adept

Witch
'A deranged witch who has been practicing witchcraft & dark arts.'
Difficulty: Intermediate

Skeleton Warrior
'Summoned by a necromancer, this creature attacks without thought or fear.'
Difficulty: Intermediate

Ghoul
'An evil spirit that robs graves and feeds on dead bodies. But first, it makes you dead.'
Difficulty: Intermediate

Hound
'A big dog that had been trained to hunt. It went rogue.'
Difficulty: Intermediate

Giant Spider
'A giant spider that gathers various creatures to feed its queen. It has a preferential taste for human flesh.'
Difficulty: Intermediate

Stone Golem
'A stone that was brought to life by uncany forces. It now sends the living to dead.'
Difficulty: Intermediate

Satyr Archer
'A satyr defending its territory. Don't mess with the goat.'
Difficulty: Intermediate

Soul Wraith
'Essence of passing spirits that siphon souls off the living.'
Difficulty: Intermediate

Minotaur
'A minotaur who takes people's souls to the Labyrinth.'
Difficulty: Advanced

Banshee
'The harbinger of death. It wails every now and then.'
Difficulty: Advanced

Shade
'A shadow darker than darkness.'
Difficulty: Advanced

Necromancer
'The master of sorcery, dark arts, and the raiser of the dead. You feel the earth tremble.'
Difficulty: Advanced

Dark Elf
'An assassin of the high order of the elven empire. Flee if you can.'
Difficulty: Advanced

Gargoyle
'A stone protector of its people of Hovengarhh.'
Difficulty: Advanced

Hellhound
'A hound straight from hell.'
Difficulty: Advanced

Giant
'A humoungous human with a giant wooden club in its hand. Still, primal.'
Difficulty: Advanced

Lesser Demon
'A malevolent watcher of the gates of hell.'
Difficulty: Advanced

Basilisk
'A giant legendary reptile.'
Difficulty: Advanced

Greater Demon
'A malevolent watcher of the throne chamber of hell.'
Difficulty: Dangerous

Araneae Regina
'A Queen Spider.'
Difficulty: Dangerous

Ember Golem
'A dangerous golum made of ember stones bursting with energy of fire.'
Difficulty: Dangerous

Ground Wyvern
'A beast that lives underground and attacks unaware preys.'
Difficulty: Dangerous

Kitarp
'A lazy goat always in its slumber until its awoken. Then, you better run...'
Difficulty: Dangerous

Chimera
'A fire breathing experiment of a mad scientist.'
Difficulty: Dangerous

Siren
'She sings a song of hope, only to lead men to death.'
Difficulty: Dangerous

Corrupt Knight
'A corrupt soul of knight who was betrayed and murdered in a battle.'
Difficulty: Dangerous

Adamant Testudo
'A giant tortoise with hardened shell.'
Difficulty: Dangerous

Harpies
'A female monster with giant vulturous wings.'
Difficulty: Dangerous

Ancient Dragon
'An ancient dragon that has been alive since the beginning of time and is though to have powers that can warp space and time.'
Difficulty: Legendary

King of Titans
'A titan that was born when the world was being moulded. Its size and strength is that belonging to the proportions of a mountain.'
Difficulty: Legendary

Treasure Monster
'An animated monster chest that contains a fortune.'
Difficulty: Legendary

Manticore
'An elemental legendary beast that is a combination of the strengths of many beasts.'
Difficulty: Legendary

Mad Scientist
'He believes in blank slates, unicorns, candies, and a world where monsters are the only creatures.'
Difficulty: Legendary

GOD
'You have faith or you don't.'
Difficulty: Legendary

DEVIL
'You fear or you don't.'
Difficulty: Legendary

Little Doll
'Do you have the heart to kill it?'
Difficulty: Legendary

Biz'kooth the One
'A monster with a single health. YOLO!'
Difficulty: Impossible

EksDe'Ess the Last
'...'
Difficulty: Impossible
